General.Name: NH Investment & Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: NH Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. engages in the wealth management, investment banking, trading, and equity sales businesses in South Korea and internationally. The company provides a range of investment products and asset management services, including stocks, funds, and ELS/DLS; corporate finance services, such as debt capital market, equity capital market; and digital sale services. It also invests and trades in, and sells equity, bonds, and FICC derivative products. The company was formerly known as Woori Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NH Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. in December 2014. NH Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. NH Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of NongHyup Financial Group Inc.
General.Address: Parc1 NH Financial Tower (TowerII), Seoul, South Korea, 07325
